pullrequest.title: merging some updates from simbody branch and update default friction values, remove max friction values.

content.html:
The viscous coefficient has units of 1/velocity (s/m if you prefer) because it is scaled by the normal force. The three coefficients are combined with the slip velocity in the Stribeck model to produce an effective coefficient of friction in a function

mu_effective = stribeck(mu_static, mu_dynamic, mu_viscous, v_slip);

The friction magnitude is then

f_friction = N*mu_effective;
